rules_text:
When this creature transforms into Garon, Puppet of Anankos, each opponent loses X life, where X is the number of corruption counters on Garon.
[i]Bölverk[/i] – Whenever an opponent sacrifices a permanent, you lose 1 life and put a corruption counter onto Garon.
[i]Great Defeat[/i] – When Garon dies, draw a card for each corruption counter on him.
